overview:
Phil is the founder of Thubit.com.

Prior to founding Thubit, Phil is a seasoned internet executive / visionary who has over 15 years of practical managing an assortment of large global initiatives. Phil has managed diverse agile teams as small as 5 to Program managing large government / banking programs with well over 75 resources.

Phil has successfully designed and implemented very complicated end to end solutions across a wide segment of industries such as ecommerce, software, retail, banking, government and food sectors. While a Program Director by trade, Philâ€™s skill sets has always been in creating new business model with a focus innovation, reusability and simplicity.

Originally hailing from Toronto, Canada Phil is now married with 4 children living on the beautiful Gold Coast, Australia. He spends his spare time playing sports with his kids, boogie boarding, running and always looking at ways to improve his cooking abilities.

milestones.description: Full-service e-commerce experts specialising in the delivery of tailor-made online solutions for all sizes of business.

As you know travel is much more than booking tickets, renting or house swapping. If you step back and think about all the things a typical traveller will do prior to, during and after a trip then that will be somewhat in line with what we are planning on
